sectionSubtitle: Tools to make life easier (for you and me)

projects.name: Prettier Java Plugin
projects.description: A VS Code plugin that uses prettier-plugin-java to format .java files

projects.name: FuzzyScore.NET
projects.description: A NuGet package that ports the Apache Commons "FuzzyScore" text similarity algorithm to .NET

projects.name: Repository Quick Launcher
projects.description: A Flow Launcher plugin to quickly open codebases using your IDE of choice (VS Code, Cursor, Zed, etc.)

projects.name: GitHub Repository Viewer
projects.description: A Flow Launcher plugin to quickly navigate to your personal repositories

sectionSubtitle: Projects that don't serve a purpose but helped me learn something new

projects.name: Personal AI Chatbot
projects.description: A fully local, Docker-first personal AI chatbot built with a microservice architecture

projects.name: Personal Website
projects.description: My personal website built with Astro and Tailwind CSS

sectionSubtitle: Contributions I have made to other people's projects

projects.name: Bruno
